title: Drinking
creator_credit: Joe Licastro, Floyd Elliott and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: By alternating live-action sequences and animated graphics, the film follows the behavioral and physiological transformations that are directly linked to consumption of alcohol. It shows the short-term and long-term effects on the human body.
